description: The path continues to the northeast along the wall of the strongholdl
to the west.  You can see lights twinkling in some of the windows
in the upper levels of the towers from here.
56245.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: Piles of debris line the walls making navigation through the
alley difficult.  Arrow slits line the walls with darkness on
the other side.  The sound of swords clashing can be faintly
heard coming from below the street.
56408.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: There is trash and debris scattered about this room from its prior
inhabitants.  There is a small table in the center of the room bolted
to the floor with some old rusted eating utensils and a bowl on it.
Against the southern wall is an old stained cot that looks like it
may still be sturdy enough to hold a person.
56424.name: {8Gu{wa{8rd P{wo{8st Break {R{room{x

description: The well worn path leads east and west here, the dence forest
pushing in on all sides.  Tall trees block most sunlight with their
limbs and leaves, and small bushes of various types line the road.
56371.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The walls in the alley stretch up smoothly 15 feet in the
air.  Arrow slits sline the walls with darkness beyond them.
The worn path continues to the west.
56407.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The path through the High Forest widens here, coming to a small
clearing.  The path all but disappears as everything fades into the
trees.  A soft glow of light can be seen off to the east where
Nordahaeril lies, and smells of bread baking can be sniffed, just
barely among the pine scent of the thick forest.
56375.name: A clearing in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path here runs north along the tall stone wall to the west. The
sun peeks through the tree branches here bathing the path in splashes
of light.  The sounds of forest animals can be heard coming from the
woods to the east.
56243.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path here bends to the northwest as it begins its descent down
the slope of the mountain.  The sounds of orc activity still fills
the area with a sense of malice and anger as the path leads further
down the mountain.
56264.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: A worn path through the dense forest curves to the east and south,
foliage of all types lining the well packed dirt.  Sounds of forest
life echo through the trees in all directions and the musty odor of
moist vegetation hangs in the air like a blanket.
56373.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path leads to the west across a ledge in the face of
the mountain.  The path itself is worn smooth from the passage
of feet of unknown origin.
56268.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: An ancient tree has fallen along the side of this dirt path.  Tall
stone walls of the Stronghold of Nine lie to the south, making it
impossible to enter from this angle.  The sounds of the forest can be
heard to the north.
56235.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This building apears to have been the area where the workers
waited to operate the citadel gates.  Debris litters the room
and the room itself seems to be in general disrepair.  Several
chairs litter the room, none of which apear likely to be able
to hold any weight.
56402.name: {8Gu{wa{8rd {RP{rost{x

56305.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path takes another sharp turn downward toward the forest.
The tops of the trees are at about eye level now as the path
becomes more visible passing between the trunks of the old
trees.
56269.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: This is a dirty and dusty room dominated by a still working forge.
Smithy tools are scattered about the area along with barrels of
swords and other pieces of scrap metal.  Racks around the room hold
many finely crafted pieces of intricate armor and weaponry.
56421.name: {8The {RS{rtronghold {RF{rorge{x

description: {8This was once the offices of the stronghold dungeons.  Desks in
various states of decay are scattered about the rooms.  Much of
the wood long since pried free and used for firewood.  Soot and
dirt cover the walls along with the tattered remains of decorative
tapestries.  A large trap door set into the stone is in one corner
leading down into the dungeons.{x
56414.name: {8The Str{wong{8hold {RD{rungeons{x

56295.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: Orc droppings and bones litter the path as it continues its
climb up the mountain.  The path turns back up the mountain now
and toward the sumit which is now within sight.
56259.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The frequency of the debris thins out a bit and the boulders
apear smaller as the path winds around them.  It would be very
difficult to squeeze a horse cart through the path due to the
number of turns.  The tree growth here is a bit thicker as the
path begins to make its way away from the mountains.
56354.name: {8The southern edge of the {BL{bost {BP{beaks{x

description: The grass finally gives way to solid rock with the
occasional sprig of grass between cracks.  The path
here is worn into the stone and still followable as
it continues to stretch to the north.
56357.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path continues along the wall to the northwest as it curves
in a long arc of carved stone. The smooth surface raises up fifteen
feet in the air making climbing over it impossible. All of the
trees low branches have long since died and fallen off making that
mode of entrance impossible as well.
56240.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The alley here continues to the east.  The stronghold outer wall
and battlements can be seen further to the east.  More debris is
piled about the area making it difficult to traverse.  Fresh foot
prints can be seen in the grime that covers the streets.
56418.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

description: The alley meets up with the outer wall of the stronghold here and turns
toward the north.  Bones arranged as a warning to trespassers line the
walls on both sides of the narrow foot path.    The sound of hammer
falling on metal can be heard a bit in the distance.
56419.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

56365.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The wall of the citadel leads north here and the path folows it hugging
it close as the trees loom ominously on the east side of the small path.
The wall stretches up fifteen feet in the air above your head.
56244.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The dirt path continues east and west here, following the fifteen
foot tall stone wall that surrounds the stronghold to the south.
The noise of small animals emanates from the forest to the north.
56234.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This is the recieving area of a large stone fortress.  Old torn
tapestries line the walls so worn with age that they are barely
recognizable.  Large  open doors lead off to the east and west
into smaller chambers.
56406.name: {8Fo{wy{8er of the {RK{reep{x

description: The dirt path trails northwest and southeast here, following the
wall of the stronghold.  The vegetation grows and twists up and over the
wall, making it impossible to pass over.
56239.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The worn stone path bends to the east as it travels between
outcroppings of rock at the base of the mountain.  Lichen clings
to the rock and small coniferous plants grow here in there in
the rocky ground.
56358.name: {8The southern edge of the {BL{bost {BP{beaks{x

description: The path continues to the northeast along the stronghold walls.  The
footpath is well worn from recent travel.  The branches sway far
above your head as the wind blows gently through the branches.
56246.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The trees begin to thin some as you approach the buildings
just to the south of here.  The disconcerting absence of the
sounds of nature has become a constant companion here as the
path travels yet closer to the ancient ruins.
56360.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path continues west along the face of the mountain and now
it is obvious that these mountains are infested with orcs.  Their
droppings are evident all along this path and the bones of their meals
have been scattered all about.
56258.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The wall of the stronghold bends to the northeast here and the path
follows it into the trees.  The trees get more ancient and tall the
further into the depths the path leads.  There is little underbrush
as almost all of the light is choked out by the branches.
56229.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The small foot path continues between buildings.  Debris is thick
here and almost seems to have been placed intentionally.  The doors
on either side all apear permanently shut.
56412.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The path here bends to the east and then apears to go upward into
the mountains.  To the north there is what apears to be a small
cave carved into the rock.
56253.name: A Path to the {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The wall of the stronghold bends to the northwest here and the path
follows it into the trees.  The trees get more ancient and tall the
further into the depths you go.  There is little underbrush as almost
all of the light is choked out by the branches.
56241.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

56316.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path curves both north and west here, around a large collection
of trees.  Forest sounds echo among the trunks and the smell of moist
vegetation hangs thick in the air.
56372.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The forest path heads off to the north as it winds through the
ancient trees.  The sounds of movement come from all around as
the wildlife moves about.  The nearest branches interweave high
above your head effectively blocking out most of the sun's light.
56273.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56334.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path bends to the west as the path travels through the
forest.  It apears as though the path splits into two up ahead
leading both north and west.
56274.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path takes a sharp down angle now as it continues its
northwest path down toward the forest floor.  The rock is
littered with bone and feces as the activity of the orcs
seems to be higher here.
56266.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: {x
{8The Iron Roa{wd continue{Ws  east and west  here. A{w small  ab{8andoned wagon
{8has long sin{wce  been f{Worgotten off to the side {wof  the ro{8ad, vines and
{8weeds all  b{wut swallow{Wing it. A large dead tree{w lies off {8 to one side,
{8parallel to {wthe road.{x
56213.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: The path winds through the woods in a northward path through the
tall ancient trees of the forest.  Above the trees can be seen the
ragged peaks of mountains poking up above the trees.  The sounds
of nature surround the area as the path winds through the twilight
of the dimly lit forest floor.
56250.name: A Path to the {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: Here the alley takes a turn to the east, bringing it further
away from the center of the stronghold.  blood is think on the
ground here as though someone has spent time defending the area
from unknown invaders.
56417.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

description: The path winds through the trees.  The stronghold walls are visible again
between teh trees as you pass through the forest.  You can make out several
guard towers and other buildings reaching to just the tops of the trees
obviously crafted to allow the stronghold to remain hidden in the forest.
56247.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: {8This road is{w  more of a w{Wide trail. Jagged ro{wcks and dust{8 are  packed
{8tight to  ma{wke adequate  {Wsurface for travelin{wg  by wheels{8  or hooves.
{8Grass lines {w the  sides o{Wf  the road with  sm{wall clusters{8  of  shrubs
{8taking  over{w now and agai{Wn. This trail contin{wues  east, o{8r leads back
{8west to The {wLong Road.{x
56200.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56311.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {x
{8Jagged stone{w and dirt mak{We up the road surfac{we here.  It {8trails lazily
{8off to the  {wwest with shr{Wubs  and tufts of  g{wrass popping{8  up now  and
{8again. South{wward, the roa{Wd begins to curve ba{wck and forth{8 around small
{8clusters of {wtrees.{x
56215.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: {8The Iron Roa{wd leads  nort{Wh and east, curving {w around smal{8l clusters of
{8trees. Jagge{wd rocks and d{Wust are packed tight{w to make ade{8quate surface
{8for travelin{wg by wheels o{Wf hooves. Grass  lin{wes the sides{8 of the road,
{8covered in a{w thick layer {Wof dust from the dir{wt of the roa{8d.{x
56205.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: {x
{8Jagged stone{w and dirt mak{We up the road surfac{we here.  It {8trails lazily
{8off to the  {wwest with shr{Wubs  and tufts of  g{wrass popping{8  up now  and
{8again. South{wward, the roa{Wd begins to curve ba{wck and forth{8 around small
{8clusters of {wtrees.{x
56214.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56293.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The Trees surround you as the citadel walls pass briefly from view.
The path you can tell is used frequently by those that care for the
huge structure that lies to your west as there is a well worn foot
trail here.
56248.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

56324.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The road continues north toward the edge of the forest where can be seen
large trees with little undergrowth.  The path here is worn from past use
but is grown over with weeds and other plant life.  You can hear the sounds
of animals coming from the north.
56216.name: The Path to {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The alley takes a turn to the north here as it winds between
the piles of debris.  The west wall of the stronghold forms the
wall of the alley here and is perfectly smooth.  The sounds of
battle continue to come from below.
56409.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

56332.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56327.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The road ends here at the thick wooden doors of a large keep.
The doors hang crookedly from rusted hinges and have been left
slightly open.  A small alley leads off to the east here winding
between the old stone structures.
56405.name: {8Ma{wi{8n Ro{wa{8d th{wro{8ugh the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The alley turns back toward the east here into the interior
of the stronghold.  Blood is becoming a plentiful decoration
on the walls and floor as the alley winds between piles of
debris.
56410.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

56294.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56292.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path here takes a slight turn to the northeast as it
continues to aproach a mountain range a good distance to
the north.  The Land here has a slow lazy wave to it
building up to the foothills of the mountains themselves.
56348.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56322.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The view from the northern edge of the mountain is impressive.  Forest
stretching as far as the eye can see.  Several structures can be seen in gaps
in the trees.  The path leads down the mountain or back to the south.
56283.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The wall of the stronghold leads north here and the path folows it hugging
it close as the trees loom ominously on the west side of the small path.
The wall stretches up fifteen feet in the air above the ground.
56226.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: {x
{8The Iron Roa{wd leads  e{Wast and south, curving  a{wround smal{8l clusters of
{8trees. Jagge{wd rocks an{Wd dust are packed tight t{wo make ade{8quate surface
{8for travelin{wg by wheel{Ws of hooves.  A well worn{w path trai{8ls off to the
{8east.{x
56210.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56306.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56290.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56296.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: As the path stretches to the west a large stone building
with large arched ceilings can be seen in the distance.
The path apears to continue just south of the structure.
56278.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The foliage begins to get a bit thicker and taller here
as the path decends the the mountain slopes.  A splendid
view of the northern forest can be viewed from this point
unobstructed by the mountain itself.
56284.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: Piles of debris line the walls making navigation through the
alley difficult.  Arrow slits line the walls with darkness on
the other side.  The sound of swords clashing can be faintly
heard coming from below the street.
56411.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: This room is in a severe state of disrepair.  The walls have
sections where stone is chipping away due to the elements.  There
is a few scattered weapons rusted from neglect in the corners of
the room.  Small shafts of light come through the arrow slits in
the walls.
56401.name: {8Gu{wa{8rd {RP{rost{x

description: This part of the path is a ledge that runs to the west along
the southern face of the mountain. Movement can be seen further
ahead down the trail.
56257.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: This well worn path taps off of the Iron Road and heads north toward
the wall of trees looming in the distance.  The Unicorn Run river flows
south along the side of the road.  The road itself while worn from use
apears not to have been used that often as of late as weeds and flowers
have sprung up between the wheel ruts.
56211.name: The Path to {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56331.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The gigantic trunk of a tree lies on either side of the roadway,
nature having long ago brought the beast down.  Someone cleared the
path both to the east and south quite well, leaving just the shell of
the monsterous tree to slowly fade back into nature.
56368.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56319.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56323.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path here winds around boulders and skree that have fallen
from the sheer  faces of the mountains to the north.  The lichen
in the area grows in patches of several different colors, mixing
here and there into beautiful natural paterns.
56355.name: {8The southern edge of the {BL{bost {BP{beaks{x

description: The musty smell of the forest presses the air around this well
traveled dirt path that twists and winds between sets of ancient
trees.  The sounds of bugs echo eerily around the area.
56369.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56304.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56314.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The trees surround the path as the stronghold walls pass briefly
from view.  The path is beaten down by heavy foot traffic in this
area as if it is traveled with heavy frequency.
56222.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The forest stretches out for miles beyond sight around the area.  The lichen
covered rocks show beaten paths that head to the west and south.  Some structures
are barely visible along the treeline in various places surrounding the mountains.
56280.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path continues along the wall to the northeast as it curves
in a long arc of carved stone. The smooth surface raises up fifteen
feet in the air making climbing over it impossible. All of the
trees low branches have long since died and fallen off making that
mode of entrance impossible as well.
56230.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This room seems to have been relatively well maintained unlike
the rest of the citadel.  The machinery is surprisingly well
oiled and apears to be in good working order.  There is a pile
of what apears to be the remains of relatively freshly eaten
meals in one corner of the room and a small ladder leading
upwards into the ceiling of the room.
56425.name: {RS{rtronghold {8Gate Mac{whin{8ery Room{x

56313.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The dirt path turns sharply to the north here, avoiding a patch of
thick thorny bushes that have grown over some long fallen ancient
tree.  The sounds of the forest echo around the area and a musty damp
smell of a dense forest hangs in the air.
56370.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {8This road is{w  more of a w{Wide trail. Jagged ro{wcks and dust{8 are  packed
{8tight to  ma{wke adequate  {Wsurface for travelin{wg  by wheels{8  or hooves.
{8Grass lines {w the  sides o{Wf  the road with  sm{wall clusters{8  of  shrubs
{8taking  over{w now and agai{Wn. This trail contin{wues  east an{8d west.
56203.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: What grows here is down to nothing more than the height
of grass and the occasional shrub that peeks itself up
over the surrounding plant life.  The sounds of the forest
fade in the area as the path leads forward toward the mountains.
56356.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The trail meanders through the trees.  small ferns and
other shade loving plant life litter the forest floor
around the path.  The view through the trees seems to
never end as the sounds of nature close in around.  It
is almost deafening in the absence of the usual noise of
a fully inhabited city.
56276.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: This is a small foot path between two buildings.  Old doors on
either side apear barred shut against intruders.  There are no
arrow slits here, however guard stations can be seen spaced out
on different locations along the roofs of the buildings.  The
alley continues to the south.
56415.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

description: The forest has thinned down to small brush and short trees as the
mountain looms up over the foliage reaching for the clouds.  The
path continues to the north through the underbrush.
56252.name: A Path to the {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path levels off momentarily as it continues downhill.  The beaten
path winds between ever increasingly tall coniferous growth.  The upper
reaches of the forest canopy obscure continued view of your surroundings.
56286.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: {x
{8The Iron Roa{wd leads  nort{Wh and east, curving {w around smal{8l clusters of
{8trees. Jagge{wd rocks and d{Wust are packed tight{w to make ade{8quate surface
{8for travelin{wg by wheels o{Wf hooves. Grass  lin{wes the sides{8 of the road,
{8covered in a{w thick layer {Wof dust from the dir{wt of the roa{8d.{w{x
56212.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: The slope of the mountain starts to even out as the path enters
the forest once again.  The wall of trees stretches up as the path
enters the trees and winds among their trunks.
56271.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path here runs north along the tall stone wall to the east.  The
sun peeks through the tree branches here bathing the path in splashes
of light.  The sounds of forest animals can be heard coming from the
woods to the west.
56227.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path here drops off down the mountain as the coniferous foliage
gets thicker.  The treeline is quickly approaching at this point and
the view is shortened by the proximity to the actual forest.
56285.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56297.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The tall stone walls that surround the stronghold curve off to the
southeast and to the west here, leaving the well traveled dirt path to
follow its shape.  A separate dirt path leads away from the stronghold,
towards the east.
56237.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: Here the path splits, the north path leads off further into the
dense forest and to the southwest a smaller path leads toward the
edge of the forest.  The tall trees sway in the ever present wind
that whips through the tops of the trees, which drop the occasional
twig or leaf.
56275.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56312.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The northern portion of the top of this mountain gives a pleasant view of the
surrounding forest.  It stretches on farther than eyes can see in every direction.
The rocks here are covered in lichen as the only vegatation due to the altitude.
The vegetation grows thicker and taller as the path leads further down the mountain.
56267.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The dirt path continues along the wall of the stronghold here.  The
wall raises up fifteen feet in the air making climbing over it
impossible.  All of the trees low branches have long since died and
fallen off making that mode of entrance impossible as well.
56238.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path gets incredibly steep here as it aproaches the top
of the mountain.  The sounds of Orc activity is all around
the path here as it continues its climb.  The rock provides little
in the way of footholds as the ascent gets progressively harder.
56260.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path follows the stone wall of the stronghold and continues to the
east and back towards the southwest.  The walls surrounding the
citadel stand fifteen feet in the air, making it impossible to climb
over.
56233.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path continues to the northwest and then downward
at a more sharp slope as the path descends toward the
ancient forest below.  The trail dissapears into the woods
further down.
56265.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path here bends true north again as it passes between
the trees.  The trees here are starting to decrease in size
and number as the mountains come into full view.  The land
here begins to rise in more insistant waves as the
range draws ever closer.
56349.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path continues to the northwest along the stronghold walls.
The footpath is well worn from recent travel.  The branches sway
far above the path as the wind blows gently through them.
56224.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

56326.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56321.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {8The Iron Roa{wd continues e{Wast and west, more o{wf a wide tra{8il than a main
{8road. Dust a{wnd  jagged st{Wones are packed  tig{wht to make a{8n idea surface
{8for hooves a{wnd a fairly a{Wdequate surface for {wwheels and f{8eet.  Tall and
{8short grass {w alike line  {Wthe side  of the roa{wd  with occa{8sional  shrubs
{8taking up sp{wace now and a{Wgain.{x
56201.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: This room at one time was used as a guard post entering the west
wing of the upper stronghold.  Piles of debris litter the ground
and the smell of excrement is strong.  The stairs themselves have
long since crumbled, leaving no access to the upper floors.
56422.name: {8The W{wes{8t {RS{rtair{x

56325.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: This is a space between two large boulders at the base of the Star
Mountains.  The to the west a hole opens up in the ground with a steep
grade headed downward into the dark.  A worn path enters the cave as
though the passage sees heavy traffic.
56399.name: A cave entrance

description: The path levels off for a bit before dropping off again
to the north.  The signs of orc activity here is less
than above, indicating that the orcs isolate themselves
to the mountains to the south.
56270.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: {x
{8The Iron Roa{wd continues e{Wast and west, more o{wf a wide tra{8il than a main
{8road. Dust a{wnd  jagged st{Wones are packed  tig{wht to make a{8n idea surface
{8for hooves a{wnd a fairly a{Wdequate surface for {wwheels and f{8eet.  Tall and
{8short grass {w alike line  {Wthe side  of the roa{wd  with occa{8sional  shrubs
{8taking up sp{wace now and a{Wgain.{w{x
56209.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: This is the north face of the mountain that overlooks the whole
of the great forest.  It stretches off farther than the eye can
see to the north and the east.  The edge can be seen to the west
and several structures can be seen in the forest.  Two paths lead
off of the mountain.  One leading to the northeast and one leading
to the northwest.
56262.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The musty smell of the forest presses the air around this well
traveled dirt path that twists and winds between sets of ancient
trees.  The sounds of bugs echo eerily around the area.
56374.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: Tall stone walls surround the Stronghold of Nine to the south that
the path follows.  The walls stand fifteen feet high, making it
impossible to enter from this angle.  Sounds of the dense forest can
be heard coming from the north.
56236.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This is the main road through the inside of the stronghold.  The
walls of the buildings are high and lined with arrow slits.  Several
large iron doors that apear stuck in their frames line the road
leading up to a much larger structure to the north.  A small alley
leads off to the west.
56403.name: {8Ma{wi{8n Ro{wa{8d th{wro{8ugh the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The path continues north along the stone wall of the stronghold.  The
ancient trees are a little thinner here in the middle of the forest
allowing a much less restricted view into the depths of the wood.
56228.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: north of here is entrance to "Halls of Four Ghosts"
{x
{8The Iron Roa{wd leads  nort{Wh and east, curving {w around smal{8l clusters of
{8trees. Jagge{wd rocks and d{Wust are packed tight{w to make ade{8quate surface
{8for travelin{wg by wheels o{Wf hooves. Grass  lin{wes the sides{8 of the road,
{8covered in a{w thick layer {Wof dust from the dir{wt of the roa{8d.{w{x
56207.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56330.name: Gates of The Citadel of The Mists

56362.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {8The Iron Roa{wd continues e{Wast and west here. A{w large rut has{8 formed in the road
{8that no  one{w has bothered{W to fix. A  large cl{wuster of trees{8  crowds around the
{8edge  of the{w trail here, {W shading a part  of {wthe road.  A t{8hick layer  of dust
{8settles over{w the tall gra{Wss that lines the ro{wad.{x
56202.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: The spires of the Stronghold of the Nine are plainly visible here.  The old
battlements rise to the tree level only visible from this kind of vantage
point.  The paths beaten into the rock stretch to the north and west.
56282.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The much smaller trees here give out to dense underbrush.
As the path crests a small hill the mountains come into full
view displaying the weather beaten peaks and crags of its
surface.  The worn foot path is still easy to follow here
as it begins its lazy slope to the base of the mountains.
56350.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path leads off along the stronghold wall to the northeast as it
weaves among the trees at the walls of the stronghold.  The nearest
branches on any close by trees are fifteen or more feet in the air,
making it impossible to use the trees to gain entrance to the
citadel walls.
56249.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This is the peak of the mountain which flattens off a bit at
the top.  A path in the stone leads off to the north toward
the north face of the mountain.
56261.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56289.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56308.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56318.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The sounds of creatures fighting over something comes from above
as small rocks bounce down the trail.  The path upward is getting
more and more worn as the path aproaches the peak of the mountain.
It appears that something lives in these hills.
56256.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56291.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path here takes a steep drop down the northern face of the
mountain.  The growth here is ever increasing in height.  The pines
are less stunted and more fully formed as they close in on the sides
of the trail.
56287.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56329.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The rocky path here gives way to the beaten dirt path leading back into
the forest.  The tall ancient trees form a dense canopy above blocking
out all but small shafts of light.
56288.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The dirt path continues along the wall of the stronghold here.  The
wall raises up fifteen feet in the air making climbing over it
impossible.  All of the trees low branches have long since died and
fallen off making that mode of entrance impossible as well.
56232.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The old road leads off to the northeast here as it bends along the
edge of the Unicorn Run.  The wall of trees looms close as you aproach
its ancient trees and secrets.  The path is littered with weeds and
flowers as if the road has not been used in quite some time.
56217.name: The Path to {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56317.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path leads off along the stronghold wall to the northwest as it
weaves among the trees at the walls of the stronghold.  The nearest
branches on any close by trees are fifteen or more feet in the air,
making it impossible to use the trees to gain entrance to the
stronghold walls.
56221.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: {x
{8The Iron Roa{wd continues e{Wast and west here. A{w large rut has{8 formed in the road
{8that no  one{w has bothered{W to fix. A  large cl{wuster of trees{8  crowds around the
{8edge  of the{w trail here, {W shading a part  of {wthe road.  A t{8hick layer  of dust
{8settles over{w the tall gra{Wss that lines the ro{wad.{x
56208.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56363.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The alley ends here against a tall stone wall.  Through a partially open
door to the west a slight glow can be seen as if from a fire.  The smell
of metal is heavy in the air, and the sound of hammering is louder than
ever.
56420.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

description: The small foot path continues between buildings.  Debris is thick
here and almost seems to have been placed intentionally.  The doors
on either side all apear permanently shut.  The alley continues to
the south.
56416.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{w {x

description: The wall of trees looms up before you obscuring the view forward as
the road you have been traveling ends and the froest begins.  The
trees look ancient and untouched by loggers even here at the very
edge of the forest.  The sounds of wildlife can be heard in the
distance echoing through the trees.
56218.name: At the edge of {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path splits here headed to the west through the trees
along a trail that aprears to be less frequently traveled.
The north path is a continuation of this one and leads further
into the forest toward what apears to be a mountain range,
the tips of which can just be seen through the tops of the trees.
56277.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The land is slightly hilly here as the path aproaches the foot of
the mountains ahead.  The trees are still thick here though they
appear to thin out further ahead on the path.
56251.name: A Path to the {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: This room at one time was the access point to the upper east wing
of the stronghold.  The stairs have long since crumbled into rubble
leaving no access to the upper floors.  The walls are a mural of
violence including finger paintings done in dried blood and gore.
56423.name: {8The E{was{8t {RS{rtair{x

description: The stone  walkways of the citadel here are in severe disrepair.
stone tiles are cracked and broken with years of seeing no maintenance
and the area looks all but abandoned.  To each side you see large
stone buildings with arrow slits cut into the walls.
56400.name: {8Ent{wra{8nce to the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: Tall trees and thick vegetation close in around this worn dirt path
through the High Forest.  Sounds of the forest come from all
directions.  Aimals bugs and birds live their daily lives with the
sounds giving eerie echos that bounce between all the ancient trees.
56367.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The Stronghold of the Nine is clearly visible from this vantage point.  Its spires
stretching over the surrounding trees.  The lichen covered rocks show beaten trails
to the north and east.
56281.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The alley ends here against the back wall of a large building.
Stone debris litteres the area from the tops of the surrounding
walls.  A large wooden door barely on its hinges is to the south
with the word "Dungeon" carved into the stone above it.
56413.name: {8A B{wac{8k Al{wl{8ey in the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The path continues north along the stone wall of the stronghold.  The
ancient trees are a little thinner here in the middle of the forest
allowing you to see between their thick trunks for fifty feet or so.
56242.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The Road leads straight through the stronghold between tall
buildings on either side.  Arrow slits line the way every few
feet.  Old dried blood can be seen between the cracks of the
paving stones that lead the way to a much larger structure to
the north.
56404.name: {8Ma{wi{8n Ro{wa{8d th{wro{8ugh the {RS{rtronghold{x

description: The path splits here headed off to the northeast along the wall, and
to the west off into the forest.  The trail headed west is faint but
prints can be made out in the soft dirt of the woods.
56231.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The rock here is littered with bones from the broken bodies of animals
and what apears to be humanoid creatures.  Even the lichen on the rocks
has been worn off from the passage of some sort of creature.  The whole
area smells of rotting flesh and death.
56255.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56320.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {8Jagged stone{w and dirt mak{We up the road surfac{we here.  It {8trails lazily
{8off to the  {wwest with shr{Wubs  and tufts of  g{wrass popping{8  up now  and
{8again. South{wward, the roa{Wd begins to curve ba{wck and forth{8 around small
{8clusters of {wtrees.{x
56204.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

56364.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56309.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56303.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: {x
{8Jagged stone{w and dirt mak{We up the road surfac{we here.  It {8trails lazily
{8off to the  {wwest with shr{Wubs  and tufts of  g{wrass popping{8  up now  and
{8again. South{wward, the roa{Wd begins to curve ba{wck and forth{8 around small
{8clusters of {wtrees.{x
56206.name: {8Th{we I{Wron {wRo{8ad{x

description: The terain levels out as the path passes into the smaller
trees at the edge of the forest.  The chirping of birds and
growling of animals can be heard echoing through the trees.
56272.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path through the woods splits here in three directions.  North
of here you see a set of massive stone gates marking the entrance to
an enourmous stronghold.  To the east and west the path leads off along
its walls.
56219.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path begins to straighten out here as the trees grow
taller.  The mountains begin to fade from view to the west
as the path continues eastward into the dense forests.
56353.name: {8The southern edge of the {BL{bost {BP{beaks{x

56333.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path winds through the trees.  The stronghold walls are visible again
between the trees as you pass through the forest.  Several guard towers
and other buildings can be seen reaching to just the tops of the trees,
obviously crafted to allow the citadel to remain hidden in the forest.
56223.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: The path continues to the northwest along the wall of the stronghold
towering to the east.  Lights flicker in some of the windows that are
barely visible over the wall of the once great keep.
56225.name: {8A path ar{wou{8nd the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

description: This is the gates to an ancient looking citadel.  Through the gates you
can see the dilapidated structures of the citadel more clearly.  The
dwarven stonework fallen into disrepair.  The gates themselves apear to
still be solid.
56220.name: {8The ga{wt{8es of the {RS{rtronghold {8of the {RN{rine{x

56315.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56302.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

56310.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path here is littered with bones and feces from the orcs
that infest this mountain range.  The path continues to the west
and down the mountain.  The forest butts right up against the
north side of the mountain and the path dissapears into its ancient
trees.
56263.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

description: The path twists between the trees here headed to the southwest.
Through the trees can be seen the shape of large buildings that
apear to be unkempt and ancient in architecture.  The sounds of
wildlife in this section of the forest are oddly absent as  the
path aproaches the ruined city.
56359.name: A well worn path in the {GH{gig{yh For{ges{Gt{x

description: The path leads upward through rocks and narrow passes.  Grumbling can
be heard from above and what apears to be humanoid forms can be seen
moving through the rocks.
56254.name: {8The {WS{wt{Wa{wr {8Mountains{x

56200.name: lotto mprog tester~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
A tall aarakocran with blue tipped feathers.  Its large strong beak
moves side to side as if watching for something.  The air around it
crackles with spells ready to be loosed.
56201.room_name: A winged warrior is here looking for orcs.
56201.name: {xAn {BA{barakocran {RBattle {rMage{x~
subroutines:
M death 56214 100~
M fight 56200 100~
M random 56202 100~

description:
A tall orc covered in scars, patches of hair cover the visible parts of
its body.  It wears studded leather armor and little else.  Splashes of
blood can be seen on its unwashed body.
56202.room_name: A tall orc is here stalking the mountainside.
56202.name: {xAn {gOr{yci{gsh {RB{rerserker{x~
subroutines:
M death 56214 100~
M fight 56201 100~
M random 56203 100~

description:
A squat orc wielding a long gnarled wooden staff.  Its leather armor
shines from its enchantments.  It wades through the battle administering
healing where needed to its bretheren.
56203.room_name: A squat orc is here chanting in a gutteral tongue.
56203.name: {cAn {gOr{yci{gsh {GS{ghaman{x~
subroutines:
M death 56214 100~
M random 56204 40~
M fight 56205 100~

description:
A tall slender aarakocran in a flowing robe.  Its rust colored beak is short
and blunted.  The feathers on its wings shine in the sun with a light blue hue.
It carries a cudgel made of bone.
56204.room_name: A slender aarakocran in a robe is here healing his allies.
56204.name: {xAn {BA{barakocran {WC{wl{We{wr{Wi{wc{x~
subroutines:
M death 56214 100~
M random 56206 45~
M fight 56207 100~

description:
A huge orc wearing wicked looking crude plate armor, patches of hair fall
below his helm.  Battle scars cover his face and arms showing his dedication
to battle.  He wears no weapon other than his spiked gauntlets.
56205.room_name: A tall orc wearing crude plate armor is here directing the assault.
56205.name: {cAn {gOr{yci{gsh {RB{rattle {RL{reader{x~
subroutines:
M give 56213 aarakocran bloodstained egg~
M grall 56212 100~

description:
A slender aarakocran woman is here hovering over her nest protecting
several round objects.  Her feathers are ruffled and some small wounds
can be seen on her limbs.
56206.room_name: A female aarakocran is here protecting her eggs.
56206.name: {cAn {BA{barakocran {MM{matron{x~

description:
A tall aarakocran male with hardened leather armor on his torso and limbs.
His sharpened black claws glisten in the light as he scans the area and chirps
out orders to his warriors.
56207.room_name: A tall aarakocran is here directing his forces in defense.
56207.name: {cAn {BA{barakocran {RB{rattle {RL{reader{x~
subroutines:
M give 56211 pristine aarakocran egg~
M grall 56210 100~

description:
{RE{rrisa {8is a stout fe{wma{8le dwarf with her hair tied back behind
her round head.  She sports a beard to make most male dw{war{8ves
jea{wlo{8us.  Her face is smeared in soot from the fo{wr{8ge, and in 
her hand she holds an intr{wic{8ate dwarven smithing hammer of
excellent craf{wtsm{8anship.{x
56209.room_name: {8A stout dw{warv{8en woman holding a smith's ha{wmm{8er is here studdying you intently.{x
56209.name: {RE{rrisa {8En{wth{8im{x~
subroutines:
M speech 56221 ready~
M speech 56220 try~
M speech 56219 craft~
M speech 56218 madness~
M speech 56217 bones~
M speech 56216 nether~
M grall 56215 50~

description:
This goblin is small and scrawny.  It moves quickly and mutters
to itself in its primitive tongue.  It is clothed in rags and wears
a small dagger at its waist.  It moves from place to place quickly
while avoiding the larger creatures in the area.
56210.room_name: {xA small {Ggoblin {xis here rooting through piles of debris.
56210.name: {8a {Ggoblin {gsc{yaven{gger{x~

description:
This is a large goblin with bulging muscles.  It moves through
the crowds of goblins and they cower from his presence.  He wears
a soiled loincloth and nothing else.  He carries in his hand a
large club that apears to be the bone of some large animal.
56211.room_name: {xA large {Ggoblin {xis here looking for a fight.
56211.name: a {Ggoblin {Rb{rruiser{x~

description:
This is an average sied goblin with a hunched back and beady eyes.  Like
its larger brethren it wears only a stained and tattered loincloth about
its groin.  A crude sword dangles from its hand as it searches about for
something to stick it in.
56212.room_name: {xAn average sized {Ggoblin {xis here with sword in hand.
56212.name: {xa {Ggoblin {Bw{barrior{x~
